title: Start a youtube network!!!
body:
Hey guys i would like to start a group of people who are keen to make funny or serious guides for League of legend.
Requirements; 
1: able to produce a video of high quality atleast once a month, 
2: Be a funny/happy person
3: Preferably have a mic
4: No discrimination in your videos what so ever
5: Be a sexy beast {{champion:1}}{{item:3128}} {{champion:1}}

replies.body: I'm down for that, add me LGA Ironsnake.

May I join, but just as a collaboration
so like 1 vid every once in a while
What do you mean by a YouTube Network?
A collection of youtubers who post videos, promote each others channels and work together on occasion is probably what they mean.
This sounds like a cool idea. I'm not all that into making LoL videos, but I am interested in getting a link when you sort this out a little bit. I like watching things :D

> [{quoted}](name=WishfulJellyfish,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=8gPcJNbe,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-01-23T23:08:30.727+0000)
>
> Hey guys i would like to start a group of people who are keen to make funny or serious guides for League of legend.
> Requirements; 
> 1: able to produce a video of high quality atleast once a month, **I don't know, might be able to.**
> 2: Be a funny/happy person **Funny? I'm f*cking hilarious!**
> 3: Preferably have a mic **Check.**
> 4: No discrimination in your videos what so ever **I only discriminate against a'holes if that counts.**
> 5: Be a sexy beast {{champion:1}}{{item:3128}} {{champion:1}} **You found the right guy, giggity giggity goo.**
Good to hear add me in LoL and we can have a chat :)
